pr_title: change minimum supported Android version to 4.2

timeline.bodyText: This is now always shown, or? So we can change it in xml and remove this line.
timeline.author: tobiasKaminsky

replies.bodyText:
Nice catch, it is already like that in the xml 👍
Removed the line!
replies.author: AndyScherzinger
